page.title: 06HEALTH IN MORETON
page.content: There are two{doctor's surgeries}in Moreton each with one female and two male doctors. Each practice has just under 4,000 patients. One of the doctors described his day. First of all he opens the post. At 09:00 surgery starts when he sees his first patient. At 11:00 after surgery is over it is time for hospital visits. Patients from Moreton can be sent to {hospitals}at Moreton, Banbury, Oxford (Radcliffe), Cheltenham, or for more serious cases to London. At 13:00 he has dinner. From then until 17:00 he is on call. Various{clinics}e.g. ante-natal are held on some afternoons. Evening surgery is held from 17:00 until 19:00. He takes it in turns to be on call at night for emergencies. There is one{dentist's {surgery}and the two dentists have 12,000 patients between them.
